articles.title: Secy. Kim Jong Il replies to youth league officials
articles.content:
Comrade Kim Jong Il replies to youth league officials 
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The great leader comrade 
Kim Jong Il sent an autograph letter on January 16 to the 
youth league's central committee officials in reply to their 
letter marking the 51st anniversary of the youth league 
(jan. 17) and the first anniversary of its development into 
the Kim Il Sung socialist youth league (jan. 19).
   His reply letter reads:
   "congratulations to you on the youth league foundation 
day.
   "i firmly believe that our valiant Young people will 
always advance vigorously together with the party in the 
sacred efforts for the prosperity of the socialist 
motherland.
    January 16, 1997.       
                 Kim Jong Il."
   in their letter to him, the youth league's central 
committee officials said the proclamation of the Kim Il Sung 
socialist youth league was a historic event which is of 
great importance in creditably carrying forward the great 
leader president Kim Il Sung's revolutionary cause 
generation after generation under the leadership of the 
respected general Kim Jong Il, and it was also the highest 
honor and commendation for the Young people and youth league 
officials of Korea.
   The letter recalled that general Kim Jong Il led the 
youth league to discharge its mission and duty as the 
president's youth organisation. The last year has seen a 
great heyday of the Korean youth movement, said the letter.
   In the letter they vowed to prepare the eight million 
young people and children of Korea to be human bombs and 
vanguard fighters for general Kim Jong Il, come what may.
   They said they would successfully train all the Young 
people and children to have a strong revolutionary spirit, 
follow only the general in any grim adversity and devotedly 
defend the headquarters of the revolution led by him, with 
16 million grenades in hand, like the Young soldiers of the 
people's army.
   They committed themselves to become most loyal lifeguards 
of general Kim Jong Il and build up the youth league as 
Kim Jong Il's youth league filled with absolute worship for 
him and the spirit of defending him at the risk of life.

articles.title: Repeal of evil laws called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repeal of evil laws called for in S. Korea
    Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Broader segments of the 
south Korean people are calling for repeal of the "law on 
the agency for national security planning" and the "labor 
laws" recently revised by the south Korean puppet clique, a 
radio report from seoul said.
   More than 400 priests of the buddhist chogye and Thaego 
orders released a declaration on the situation and formed an 
emergency council of buddhists for repeal of anti-democratic 
laws and nearly a half of all roman chatholic fathers issued 
a declaration on the situation declaring disobedience to the 
evil laws.
   On the 16th of January, protestants formed a committee 
of christians to cope with the emergency situation and 
released a declaration on the situation on behalf of 1,000 
pastors throughout south Korea, expressing their resolution 
to fight in solidarity with the conscientious forces for 
repeal of the evil laws.
   The number of those professors who joined in a campaign 
began by the professors of konkuk university and han sin 
college on January 8 as regards the present political 
situation reached 2,431 of 32 universities and Colleges in a 
matter of a week.
   Some 2,800 teachers of middle and high schools, 
about 600 doctors, 550 lawyers and more than 1,100 
housewives under the influence of a women's organisation 
issued declarations on the situation and said that they 
cannot recognise the two "laws" unilaterally railroaded and 
will fight together with the workers.
   Broader segments of the people will be likely to issue 
a declaration on the situation as the men of culture and 
artists and some local "assemblies" made public resolutions 
calling for repeal of  the "law on the ansp" and "labor 
laws".
   On January 17, upwards of 3,000 unionists of the 
organisations under the "Korean confederation of trade 
unions" held a rally in seoul and reiterated their 
willingness to continue strikes until the withdrawal of the 
recently-revised "labor laws."

articles.title: Paper on Japan's "Mode of defence"
articles.content:
Paper on Japan's "Mode of defence"
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong sinmun today 
comments on a document on the long-term prospects of 
security conditions and the mode of Japan's defence recently 
issued by the Japan defence institute.
   The news analyst says:
   in the document, the Japanese reactionaries called for 
building a nuclear-powered submarine for Japan to secure 
"deterrent force" against China. They defined the dependence 
of the capacity of the use of force on the united states and 
the enhancement of military capacity till the end of the 
20th century as the key note of the "mode of defence."
   their aim is to step up the efforts to become a military 
power and realise the ambition for overseas military 
expansion with the backing of the united states.
   As the pretext of threat from the soviet union 
disappeared and the pretext of "threat from North Korea" is 
not convincing, Japan is raising a hue and cry over 
"military threat" from China by 2015 in a bid to continue 
with their efforts to become a military power.
   The Japanese reactionaries talk about "reduced influence 
of the united states on Asia-pacific region." this reveals 
their intention to win U.S. Connivance and patronage over 
Japan's effort for a military power, get rid of U.S. 
Control completely, behave as a big power and overtly 
establish their control in this region.
   They have so far worked hard to build a military power 
and legitimate overseas dispatch of the "self-defence 
forces." 
   on this basis, they are stepping up their ambitious 
military buildup and overseas expansion in real earnest.
   They must clearly know that those who go against the 
trend of the times and the desires of the people will never 
go scotfree.

articles.title: Press Review
articles.content:
Press Review
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Papers here today 
carry an autographic letter sent by the great leader 
comrade Kim Jong Il on jan. 16 in reply to a letter sent by 
officials of the central committee of the Kim Il Sung 
socialist youth league on the 51st anniversary of the 
democratic youth league and the first anniversary of the 
proclamation of the Kim Il Sung socialist youth league and 
the letter from the officials of the youth league. 
   Rodong sinmun carries an epic "love Young people" devoted 
to the workers' party of Korea.
   Given in the paper is news that comrade Kim Jong Il 
exchanged new year's cards with party and state leaders of 
different countries.
   Under comrade Kim Jong Il's aphorism "those living on 
their own strength flourish and those living on other's 
strength go to ruin", Minju joson edits articles saying that 
the Korean people advance revolution and construction by 
themselves, bearing his aphorism in mind.  
   Rodong sinmun introduces productive innovations in the 
field of coal industry.
   Papers carry news that south Korean workers and people 
continue the struggle for the withdrawal of the evil laws 
and trade unions of many countries expressed solidarity with 
their struggle.
   Printed in the press is an appeal issued by the central 
committee of the national democratic front of south Korea 
calling upon all the south Korean people to turn out as one 
in the struggle for the withdrawal of the evil laws and the 
overthrow of the Kim Young Sam civilian-veiled dictatorial 
regime.
   Papers inform the readers that the central committee 
of the Korean social democratic party sent letters to the 
"Korean confederation of trade unions", dissident 
organisations and opposition parties of south Korea and 
officials of social democratic parties of different 
countries in connection with the massive struggle of south 
Korean workers and people against the revision of the 
"labour laws" and "law on the agency for national security 
planning".    
   Rodong sinmun runs a commentary denouncing the Kim Young 
sam group's plot to forcibly link the south Korean workers' 
struggle with the north.
   The paper in a commentary denounces the Japanese 
reactionaries' argument about "mode of defence existence"  
as one for military power and overseas expansion.
   A commentary of the paper condemns the utterances of 
takami eto, former Japanese director general of the 
management and coordination agency for justifying the 
history of Japan's past aggression on Korea.
   Minju joson carries a commentary condemning the nuclear 
war provocation moves of the U.S. And the Japanese 
reactionaries in conspiracy.
   Rodong sinmun runs an article titled "imperialists' arms 
export move for domination and plunder".

articles.title: NDFSK  calls for ouster of "Civilian" dictatorship
articles.content:
NDFSK calls for ouster of "Civilian" dictatorship
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The central committee of 
the national democratic front of south Korea (ndfsk) on 
January 13 published an appeal calling on the entire south 
Korean people to turn out as one in the struggle to abolish 
evil laws and overthrow Kim Young sam's "civilian" 
dictatorial regime, according to the radio voice of 
national salvation from seoul.  The appeal said:
   the pan-national struggle is an explosion of the anger of 
people against the "civilian" dictatorship which arbitrarily 
legallised non-rights and slavish obedience and an 
expression of the firm will to realize liberation of labour 
and true democratic politics.
   The present situation is calling on the people to rise in 
struggle and pave the way for livelihood without any 
hesitation or vacillation.
   When the entire people rise in struggle, the traitorous 
"civilian" dictatorship will Collapse as the dictatorial 
regimes of syngman rhee, park chung hee and chun doo hwan 
did.
   All people should join in the pan-national resistance 
against the "civilian" dictatorship in south Korea with the 
same spirit as they displayed in the april 19, 1960 
uprising, the  October 1979 fight and the june 1987 
resistance.
   The dissidents and people of all strata should solidarize 
with each other to vigorously wage a joint struggle against 
"chongwadae", the headquarters of dictatorship.

articles.title: Prelude to bloody suppression
articles.content:
Prelude to bloody suppression
    Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Kim Young Sam group 
are now connecting the massive strikes of the south Korean 
workers with the northern half of Korea in a far-fetched 
manner, talking about "pro-north leftist tendency".
   Rodong sinmun today denounces the fascists for their anti-
DPRK farce.  The analyst goes on:
   the Kim Young Sam group let the press spread the 
ridiculous rumor that copies of literature  encouraging the 
workers to topple the government of the capitalists as the 
northern half of Korea wished were found in a place of sit-
in strikes around the myongdong cathedral. And they told a 
press conference that North Korea is inspiring workers to 
topple the government and that if the unrest drags on it 
will give North Korea an opportunity to attack south Korea. 
   Such utterances are a prelude to the bloody suppression, 
an indication that they are trying to brutally crack down 
upon the just strikes of the south Korean workers by 
connecting them with the northern half of Korea.
   The situation is very dangerous and needs the vigilance 
of the south Korean workers. The south Korean workers and 
people of other strata should not be deceived by the 
stereotyped plots of the Kim Young Sam group, but mete out a 
stern punishment to the Kim Young Sam group through a more 
united and stubborn struggle, a group which is attempting to 
describe them as "pro-communist elements" and plunge them 
into a bloodbath.

articles.title: South Korean workers' struggle supported
articles.content:
South Korean workers' struggle supported
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Sergio cofferati, general 
secretary of the general confederation of labour= sergio 
dantoni, secretary general of the confederation of working 
people trade unions= and piettro larizza, secretary general 
of the labour unions of italy= sent a joint letter to their 
government on January 10 in connection with the fact that 
the Kim Young Sam clique brutally suppresses the strike of 
the south Korean workers.
   They asked the ministers of foreign affairs, labour 
and foreign trade to urge the south Korean authorities to  
stop suppressing the workers and to ensure democratization 
of society. They added that the new "labour laws" which were 
secretly passed at the puppet parliament at the end of last 
year violate international accords.
   Members of the U.S. Garment workers' union and the 
union of international service staged a demonstration 
against the revision of "labour laws" of south Korea in 
front of the south Korean puppet consulate general in new 
york on January 10.
   The french general confederation of labour, in a 
statement on January 10 denouncing the south Korean 
authorities' suppression of the strike, called upon 
organizations under the confederation to send letters to the 
south Korean trade unions and express solidarity. 
   The nepalese general confederation of trade unions, in a 
protest letter to the traitor Kim Young Sam on January 10, 
said that the south Korean authorities should stop 
suppression of the trade unions and their leaders. 
   Many members of the  nepal congress of trade unions 
staged a protest demonstration in front of the south Korean 
puppet embassy in katmandu with slogan-board reading 
"abolish labour laws in south Korea" on January 11.
   The trade unions of the people's rally, the journalists' 
union,  the lome autonomous harbor union and the teachers' 
union of benin university  in togo issued a joint statement 
on January 15 in support of the south Korean workers' 
struggle.
   The ugandan union of railway workers sent a protest 
letter to the south Korean authorities, and the movement of 
struggle for peace among the people and tribes of benin 
released a statement denouncing the suppression of the south 
Korean workers in strike on January 14.

articles.title: Kotohngryon preparatory comm. For celebrating 55th birthday of secy. Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kothongryon preparatory committee for celebrating 55th birthday of comrade Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Russian and Moscow 
kothongryon (united confederation of Koreans) preparatory 
committee for celebrating the 55th birthday of the great 
leader comrade  Kim Jong Il was inaugurated. 
   The inaugural meeting was held in Moscow on jan. 14. 
   At the meeting Ri tong Chol, chairman of the Russian 
kothongryon, was nominated for the chairmanship of the 
committee.
   The speakers expressed the will and zeal of the 
compatriots to celebrate the 55th birthday of comrade 
Kim Jong Il as a common festival of humankind and the most 
auspicious holiday of the nation.

articles.title: Deep attention to S. Korean people's struggle called for
articles.content:
Nuclear war preparations can not be allowed
    Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- It has been brought to 
light that when making a decision on the "return" of 
okinawa, the united states and Japan reached a secret 
agreement on the re-introduction of nuclear weapons in the 
"event of an emergency".
   Minju joson today, commenting on this, says that it is 
the wild ambition of the U.S. And Japanese reactionaries to 
dominate the world through the medium of a nuclear war and 
so they have long conspired together for the provocation of 
a nuclear war.  The analyst goes on:
   Japan is the only and one victim to the nuclear weapon. 
It has a good knowledge of the danger and consequences of 
the nuclear war before any country else. The Japanese 
reactionaries are running amuck to unleash a nuclear war, 
though.
   The nuclear war provocation moves of the U.S. And 
Japanese reactionaries have brought the situation in and 
around the Korean peninsula into an extreme pitch of strain.
   The escalation of tensions is not beneficial to any one, 
but will only plunge humankind into a nuclear holocaust.
   The Japanese reactionaries should ponder over what grave 
consequences their nuclear war preparations will produce and 
put an immediate halt to the nuclear arming.

articles.title: Ksdp favors struggle in S. Korea
articles.content:
Deep attention to S. Korean people's struggle called for
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The central committee of 
the Korean social democratic party sent a letter to 
officials of social democratic parties of all countries 
around the world calling upon them to pay deep attention to 
the just struggle of the south Korean workers and people of 
other strata and adopt an appropriate step in support of 
their struggle.  The letter dated January 17 says:
   the struggle of the south Korean workers and people of 
other social standings, which began with the secret 
railroading of the anti-social "labor laws" and  "law on the 
agency for national security planning" aimed at violating 
democratic freedom and elementary right to existence and 
blocking national reconciliation and unity is only too 
natural as it is the exercise of the basic right to 
existence.
   The struggle, never witnessed before in view of scope and 
fierceness, enjoys full support worldwide, let alone in 
south Korea.

articles.title: Japan urged to come to talks for postwar settlement
articles.content:
Ksdp favors struggle in S. Korea
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The central committee of 
the Korean social democratic party sent letters on jan. 17 
to the "Korean confederation of trade unions," dissident 
organizations and opposition parties in south Korea and 
expressed compatriotic support to them in the struggle for 
withdrawal of the evil "law on the agency for national 
security planning" and "labor laws".
   The letters said that without repeal of the fascist "ansp 
law" and "labor law", independence, democracy and 
reunification cannot be expected in south Korea and that 
without overthrow of the traitorous Kim Young Sam regime 
inter-Korean relations cannot be improved nor can the 
country be reunified. 
   The letters wished them victory in the struggle and urged 
the south Korean dissident organisations and all the 
politicians of opposition parties to take the van in the 
struggle, not remaining indifferent to the situation.

articles.title: Rodong sinmun on militarist utterances
articles.content:
Japan urged to come to talks for postwar settlement
   Moscow, January 18 (KCNA) -- A press conference was 
held at the DPRK embassy in Russia on January 13 as 
regards the fact that the Japanese authorities are still 
misleading public opinion, not making a sincere approach to 
the issue of liquidation of the past. 
   Ambassador son Song Phil told reporters that liquidation 
of the disgraceful past and improvement of ties between the 
DPRK and Japan are what the peoples of the two countries 
wish and what the DPRK government has consistently called 
for.
   Last year, the Japanese authorities did not sincerely 
approach the improvement of bilateral ties by making some 
"preconditions", son said, and stressed: in this connection 
the DPRK clarified its position that it does not mind 
whether its relations with Japan are normalised or not.
   Japan should discharge its legal and moral obligation, 
mindful that the atonement for the crimes it committed in 
the first half of the 20th century cannot be left to the 
21st century. 
   Japan should understand that it is quite impossible to 
normalize bilateral relations without liquidation of the 
past.
   The Japanese authorities would be well advised to stop 
acting impudently, regarding it as a "present" to establish 
diplomatic ties between the two countries. 
   Japan should not foolishly think that its past will be 
buried in oblivion by the pasage of time. It should come out 
to negotiations for the settlement of the past without 
delay, deeply aware that if it continues avoiding it, its 
responsibility will be heavier.

articles.title: Epic "Love Young people"
articles.content:
Rodong sinmun on militarist utterances
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong sinmun today 
comments on the militarist utterances made by former 
director general of the management and coordination agency 
of Japan, Takami Eto, in Kitakyushu, Fukuoka prefecture, 
Japan, a few days ago.
   He defended Japan's aggression and Colonial rule in 
Korea.  He said "why is a treaty between countries now 
called an invasion? what's the difference between that and 
the merger of a town and a village?" and recently he 
expressed doubts about the credibility of descriptions of 
wartime sex slaves, or "comfort women for the army" in 
Japanese history textbooks, which was confirmed by the stark 
historic facts and numerous data.
   The news analyst says:
   his shameless remarks clearly indicate that the 
militarist mode of thinking  and attitude of the Japanese 
reactionaries remain unchanged.
   The Japanese reactionaries' defence of Japan's invasion 
of Korea and Colonial rule in Korea is aimed at inciting the 
consciousness of aggression among the Japanese and 
encouraging them to set comeback to Korea.
   We are following the moves of the Japanese militarist 
forces to justify the history of Japan's aggression on 
Korea.
   Eto should be wholly held responsible for his remarks and 
apologize to the Korean people.

articles.title: S. Korea's continued military buildup
articles.content:
Epic "Love Young people"
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) --  Rodong sinmun today 
carries an epic "love Young people" Kim Song Chol, a youth 
league official, dedicated to the workers' party of Korea.
   It deals with politics of attaching importance to the 
youth pursued by the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il, who 
deeply loves the Korean Young people and considers them 
heirs to and main force of the revolution.
   It says he has conducted energetic activities to defend 
through generations the undying revolutionary achievements 
the great leader president Kim Il Sung made all his life 
for the development and prosperity of the country after 
starting his revolutionary activities from the youth 
movement.  The epic says:
   comrade Kim Jong Il had the league of socialist working 
youth of Korea named after president Kim Il Sung on the 
occasion of its 50th anniversary and set the most 
significant day in his leadership over the youth movement as 
youth day.
   With the lswyk renamed the Kim Il Sung socialist youth 
league, the organization of the Young people has always 
remained a youth vanguard of comrade Kim Il Sung. This is 
one of the greatest achievements made by comrade 
Kim Jong Il.
   His politics for the youth is based on deep love for 
them. He, inheriting comrade Kim Il Sung's lifelong motto 
"love the future " put up the slogan "love Young people " 
he has honored them with "youth vanguard" and conveyed to 
them the torch kindled by comrade Kim Il Sung 70 years ago 
forming the "down-with-imperialism union".
   Considering that the party, the army and the youth league 
in an integral whole have nothing to fear, he has 
victoriously guided the Korean revolution and the youth 
movement.
   The epic calls on the Young men and women in the era of 
the red flag to devotedly defend comrade Kim Jong Il and 
resolutely safeguard juche-based socialism developed by him, 
fully playing the role of his detached force.

articles.title: Delegation of iaea here
articles.content:
S. Korea's continued military buildup
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The South Korean puppets 
have escalated military buildup from the beginning of the 
year.
   According to a news report, they purchased tanks and 
armoured vehicles recently.
   The puppet defence ministry decided to hold a "discussion 
on defence policy" in seoul every year, crying for 
"diversification of military diplomacy".
   Large quantities of combat equipment purchased by the 
puppets, who are seeking close military cooperation with 
western countries, have become a serious political and 
military problem which poses a great danger.
   Though the Cold war was terminated, the Korean peninsula 
has still remained an acute region where huge armed forces 
of the north and the south are confronted with each other 
along the military demarcation line.
   Under this situation, an accidental conflict may lead to 
a war, wrecking peace and security.
   From the beginning of the year, the south Korean puppets 
have frequently staged military drills against the north in 
the mdl areas, while escalating arms buildup for "increased 
combat power".
   They have planned to purchase multiple rocket launching 
system, surface-to-air missiles and tactical missiles this 
year with an investment of d4,640 million, or 15 percent 
higher than last year's.
   The facts show that it is the south Korean puppets who 
have increased tension and brought the situation to the 
brink of war in the Korean peninsula and that their call for 
"peace" and "cooperation" is nothing but a hypocritical 
propoganda.
   What cannot be overlooked is that some nations which have 
called for "multi-way talks" for a solution to the Korean 
issue and peace and stability of the Korean peninsula have 
strengthened military cooperation with the puppets, 
unilaterally supplying them, hell-bent on war moves, with 
military equipment.
   We have continued making sincere efforts to relax the 
situation of the Korean peninsula and ensure peace and 
stability in this region.
   But some countries, giving lip-service to peace and 
stability of the Korean peninsula, have provided military 
equipment to the South Korean puppets. This is a very 
perfidious act.
   Supplying combat and technical equipment to the puppets, 
who are seeking confrontation and conflicts with the fellow 
countrymen in the north, is as good as encouraging them to 
a war.
   Fostering a crime is a more grave. 
   The countries must not break their word and the South 
Korean puppets must stop reckless arms buildup.
